High above the clouds, Captain Zephyr commanded the pirate ship, "The Celestial Marauder." With sails woven from starlight, the crew of dreamers navigated the shimmering skies, plundering forgotten constellations. One day, they stumbled upon the lost city of Aetheria, a realm where time stood still. The inhabitants, ethereal beings of light, welcomed the pirates with open arms, offering them the gift of eternal dreams. In exchange, the crew shared tales of their adventures, sparking a friendship that bridged worlds. As the sun set, painting the sky in hues of gold, Captain Zephyr realized that treasure was not gold, but the bonds they forged.
